languages.text: {n}Дознаватель сначала дергается от прикосновения... а затем, словно кожей почувствовав, кто гладит его по щеке, задыхается от облегчения.{/n} "{name}... это ты? Ты... жива?" {n}Едва повернув голову, Хейнрикс прижимается губами к вашей ладони.{/n} "Прошу, найди способ вынуть меня отсюда..."

{n}He flinches at your touch at first... then, as if he can feel who is caressing his cheek, he gasps with relief.{/n} "{name}... is it you? You... you're alive?" {n}Struggling to turn his head, Heinrix presses his lips against your palm.{/n} "Please, find a way to get me out of this thing..."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель сначала дергается от прикосновения... а затем, словно кожей почувствовав, кто гладит его по щеке, задыхается от облегчения.{/n} "{name}... это ты? Ты... жива?" {n}Едва повернув голову, Хейнрикс прижимается губами к вашей ладони.{/n} "Прошу, найди способ вынуть меня отсюда..."

traits.locale_text: {n}He flinches at your touch at first... then, as if he can feel who is caressing his cheek, he gasps with relief.{/n} "{name}... it's you? You're... alive?" {n}Barely managing to turn his head, Heinrix presses his lips against your palm.{/n} "Please, find a way to pull me out of this thing..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼は、誰が自分の頬を撫でてくれているのかを感じ取ったかのように、安堵の表情を浮かべる。{/n}「{name}…あなたなのか？生きて…いたのか？」{n}ハインリックスはなんとか顔を向け、あなたの手の平に唇を押し当てる。{/n}「お願いだ。俺をこいつから解放してくれ…」
languages.original_text: {n}He flinches at your touch at first... then, as if he can feel who is caressing his cheek, he gasps with relief.{/n} "{name}... is it you? You... you're alive?" {n}Struggling to turn his head, Heinrix presses his lips against your palm.{/n} "Please, find a way to get me out of this thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は、誰が自分の頬を撫でてくれているのかを感じ取ったかのように、安堵の表情を浮かべる。{/n}「{name}…あなたなのか？生きて…いたのか？」{n}ハインリックスはなんとか顔を向け、あなたの手の平に唇を押し当てる。{/n}「お願いだ。俺をこいつから解放してくれ…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}你刚一碰到他，他就向后退缩起来……但随后，他似乎感觉到是谁在抚摸他的脸颊，他松了口气。{/n}“{name}……是你吗？你……你还活着吗？”{n}海因里希挣扎着转过头，将嘴唇贴在你的手掌上。{/n}“拜托了，想个办法把我从这东西里弄出来……”
languages.original_text: {n}He flinches at your touch at first... then, as if he can feel who is caressing his cheek, he gasps with relief.{/n} "{name}... is it you? You... you're alive?" {n}Struggling to turn his head, Heinrix presses his lips against your palm.{/n} "Please, find a way to get me out of this thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}你刚一碰到他，他就向后退缩起来……但随后，他似乎感觉到是谁在抚摸他的脸颊，他松了口气。{/n}“{name}……是你吗？你……你还活着吗？”{n}海因里希挣扎着转过头，将嘴唇贴在你的手掌上。{/n}“拜托了，请想个办法把我从这东西里弄出来……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Al principio se estremece ante tu contacto... luego, como si sintiera quién le acaricia la mejilla, jadea aliviado.{/n} «{name}... ¿Es usted? ¿Sigue con vida?». {n}Luchando por girar la cabeza, Heinrix presiona sus labios contra tu palma.{/n} «Por favor, encuentre una forma de sacarme de esta cosa...».
languages.original_text: {n}He flinches at your touch at first... then, as if he can feel who is caressing his cheek, he gasps with relief.{/n} "{name}... is it you? You... you're alive?" {n}Struggling to turn his head, Heinrix presses his lips against your palm.{/n} "Please, find a way to get me out of this thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al principio se estremece ante tu contacto... luego, como si sintiera quién le acaricia la mejilla, jadea aliviado.{/n} «{name}... ¿Es usted? ¿Sigue con vida?». {n}Luchando por girar la cabeza, Heinrix presiona sus labios contra tu palma.{/n} «Por favor, encuentre una forma de sacarme de esta cosa...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Zunächst zuckt er bei deiner Berührung zusammen ... Dann, als könnte er spüren, wer da über seine Wange streicht, keucht er erleichtert auf.{/n} "{name} ... seid Ihr das? Ihr ... lebt?" {n}Heinrix versucht mühsam, seinen Kopf zu drehen, und drückt seine Lippen gegen deine Handfläche.{/n} "Bitte, findet einen Weg, mich aus diesem Ding zu befreien ..."
languages.original_text: {n}He flinches at your touch at first... then, as if he can feel who is caressing his cheek, he gasps with relief.{/n} "{name}... is it you? You... you're alive?" {n}Struggling to turn his head, Heinrix presses his lips against your palm.{/n} "Please, find a way to get me out of this thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Zunächst zuckt er bei deiner Berührung zusammen ... Dann, als könnte er spüren, wer da über seine Wange streicht, keucht er erleichtert auf.{/n} "{name} ... seid Ihr das? Ihr ... Ihr lebt?" {n}Heinrix versucht mühsam, seinen Kopf zu drehen, und drückt seine Lippen gegen deine Handfläche.{/n} "Bitte, findet einen Weg, mich aus diesem Ding zu ziehen ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Dans un premier temps, le contact de votre main sur sa peau le fait tressaillir... mais ensuite, comme s'il pouvait sentir qui caresse sa joue, il pousse un long soupir de soulagement.{/n} « {name}... est-ce bien vous ? Vous êtes {mf|vivant|vivante} ? » {n}Luttant pour tourner la tête, il presse ses lèvres contre votre paume.{/n} « Je vous en prie, trouvez un moyen de me libérer de cet engin... »
languages.original_text: {n}He flinches at your touch at first... then, as if he can feel who is caressing his cheek, he gasps with relief.{/n} "{name}... is it you? You... you're alive?" {n}Struggling to turn his head, Heinrix presses his lips against your palm.{/n} "Please, find a way to get me out of this thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans un premier temps, le contact de votre main sur sa peau le fait tressaillir... mais ensuite, comme s'il pouvait sentir qui caresse sa joue, il pousse un long soupir de soulagement.{/n} « {name}... est-ce bien vous ? Vous êtes {mf|vivant|vivante} ? » {n}Luttant pour tourner la tête, il presse ses lèvres contre votre paume.{/n} « Je vous en prie, trouvez un moyen de me libérer de cet engin... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, ilk başta temasından irkiliyor... Ardından sanki yanağını kimin okşadığını hissedip iç rahatlığıyla nefes alıyor.{/n} "{name}... Sen mi geldin? Sen... Sen hayatta mısın?" {n}Heinrix, zorlana zorlana başını döndürerek dudaklarını avucuna dayıyor.{/n} "Lütfen beni bu şeyden kurtarmanın bir yolunu bul..."
languages.original_text: {n}He flinches at your touch at first... then, as if he can feel who is caressing his cheek, he gasps with relief.{/n} "{name}... is it you? You... you're alive?" {n}Struggling to turn his head, Heinrix presses his lips against your palm.{/n} "Please, find a way to get me out of this thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ilk başta temasından irkiliyor... Ardından, yanağını kimin okşadığını hissedebiliyormuşçasına iç rahatlığıyla nefes alıyor.{/n} "{name}... Sen mi geldin? Sen... Sen hayatta mısın?" {n}Heinrix zorlana zorlana başını döndürerek dudaklarını senin avucuna dayıyor.{/n} "Lütfen beni bu şeyden kurtarmanın bir yolunu bul..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
